love it

D is for flash because it's your panic button. It's a smooth key and it just feels right.

F is for Fire (or everything else) because it has the little 'finger-placement' bump on it, so it actually feels like a "real key" meant to do something important, such as exhaust your opponent or burn them down haha

I handle feeding by farming up my lane until the game is 30 minutes in and then wrecking face because I'm actually playing {{champion:78}} .

It's alright. If you're playing Poppy, feeding is part of the process. If you're not feeding and have decent cs in lane as Poppy, then you've already won.
